page.title: 03A DISABLED PERSON
page.content: {John Symons }has been attending the { {Marsh Lane Centre }for three years.Multiple Sclerosis first affected him in 1976 when he started to limp and had to use a walking stick.Gradually he was forced to use two sticks and by 1980 couldn't walk at all.In 1983 he stopped driving.He has a ground floor extension built on his house which has a bedroom and bathroom.He can't take part in the activities at the centre because he is unable to use his hands without holding them steady.{Mr. Symons }is the centre's coordinator and makes sure the disabled people receive their correct allowances.He finds that there aren't adequate facilities for disabled people but does noy feel discriminated against.Attending the centre keeps his mind busy and he goes there each day.
